description: A steady but moderate climb to sun-alpine McCrae Lake near Revelstoke. There is an option to continue up to Mt McCrae. A fork appears at 1.9 km of the trail; left continues on to the lake while going right will take you up the ridge. There are a couple of tent platforms and an outhouse at the site. The trailhead is marked with a sign.
directions: From Revelstoke, follow Airport Way until end of pavement. Immediately after leaving pavement, stay left at the Y, you are now on Akilkolex Forest Service Rd. Upon crossing over the Akolkolex River by the hydro station, stay left. At 22.1 km stay right. At 22.5 km the signed McCrae Rd is on the left, turn here. Follow McCrae rd until the trailhead sign appears on the left hand side of the rd.
title: McCrae Lake
